definition.value:
A string of character(s) used to identify the person whom the plan is for.
This may be the Medicaid ID number where applicable.
The type of unique identifier used to identify the person whom the plan is for. Values include: Medicaid Number, State ID, Medical Record Number, Other (free text).

comment.value: Can be one of Medicaid Number, State ID, Medical Record Number, Other (free text).

definition.value: The name of the person whom the plan is for.

comment.value: 1) given is used for both first name & MI, so need more than one. 2) family is a string with the person's surname 3) text is a string that contains the full name of the person.

definition.value: The primary phone number of the person whom the plan is for, or his/her legal representative, where applicable.

comment.value: For the eLTSS phone number, system should be provided as "phone".

definition.value: The birth date of the person whom the plan is for.
The address of the person whom the plan is for.

comment.value: 1) text is the full (not broken out) address. 2) line includes street name, number and suffix (e.g. 123 Main St.). 3) Information such as apt #, floor & room #, etc. also go into line, generally as a separate data element. 4) district covers county.

definition.value: Emergency Contact Name + Phone Number + Relationship.

comment.value: 1) Emergency contact is indicated using a relationship value "C". 2) If contact is provided, relationship needs to be provided to indicate this is an emergency contact. 3) given is used for both first name & MI, so need more than one. 4) family is a string with the person's surname 5) text is a string with the full name of the person.

definition.value: The relationship (e.g., spouse, neighbor, guardian, daughter) of the individual identified to contact in case of emergency.
The name of the individual or entity identified to contact in case of emergency.
The primary phone number (and extension when applicable) of the individual or entity identified to contact in case of emergency.
